Label: CALM1
Comment: Refers to the calmodulin family of genes

Label: ATP2A1
Comment: SERCA</br>Calcium channel - Supervises intracellular Ca levels

Label: MHC class I/CD8B
Comment: CD8 glycoprotein co-receptor for the T cell receptor (TCR). This is the beta isoform of the protein.

Label: MHC class I/CD8A
Comment: CD8 glycoprotein co-receptor for the T cell receptor (TCR). This is the alpha isoform of the protein.

Label: MHC class II/CD4
Comment: CD4 glycoprotein co-receptor for the T cell receptor (TCR).

Label: ITPRIP
Comment: IP3 receptor for the calcium channel
